home.title: Welcome
home.lead: Forward any message to the bot to create notes. Open the Mini App to browse, search, and export a ZIP of your vault.
home.noNotes: No notes yet - send a message to the bot to create your first note.
search.title: Search
add.title: Add Materials
add.lead: Upload images, audio/voice, paste text or add a YouTube link to create new notes.
add.image.label: Choose an image file
add.audio.label: Choose an audio file
add.text.label: Enter text
add.text.hint: Use this to quickly add notes from copied text.
add.video.label: YouTube link
add.video.hint: Provide a public video URL for processing.
add.disclaimer: By adding materials you confirm you have rights to process them.
my.title: My Data
my.lead: Browse and manage your collected notes.
